It was every PREDACON for themselves as VI=
CE GRIP leapt up to tryand tunnel upwards, away from the magma, in his hast=
e potentially starting a possibel collapse over in it as DINOBOT raced wild=

surface!

Meanwhile, the poor, abandoned head of WASPINATOR hit the pool of=

 HATE WAZZPINATOR BY BURNING!?"
